entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
